product_name: Showers Pass Rogue Hoodie Soft-Shell Bike Jacket - Men's
long_description: The streetwise Showers Pass Rogue Hoodie soft-shell bike jacket wears just like your favorite hoodie, but boasts technical performance to rock your ride. Fleece-lined fabric is both waterproof and breathable; however, because seams are not sealed, product specs state the jacket is not waterproof. Cozy wrist gaiters feature thumbholes to provide warmth and keep sleeves in place. Hood fits under or over most helmets. Adjustable drawcords cinch down hem and hood to seal in warmth. Large zippered back pocket features a light loop. Zippered hand pockets; audio port in right pocket lets you tote your tunes. Showers Pass Rogue hoodie features reflective trim to help keep you visible at night.
short_description: The streetwise Showers Pass Rogue Hoodie soft-shell bike jacket wears just like your favorite hoodie, but boasts technical performance to rock your ride.
